1.name: The Birth of a Nation
1.description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

2.name: Les vampires
2.description: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.

4.name: The Cheat
4.description: A venal, spoiled stockbroker's wife impulsively embezzles $10,000 from the charity she chairs and desperately turns to a Burmese ivory trader to replace the stolen money.

5.name: Der Golem
5.description: In this version of the golem legend, the golem, a clay statue brought to life by Rabbi Loew in 16th century Prague to save the Jews from the ongoing brutal persecution by the city's rulers,...                See full summary »

6.name: Alice in Wonderland
6.description: Alice goes with her sister to a picnic and then she falls asleep and starts dreaming about a wonder land full of talking animals and walking playing cards.

7.name: Carmen
7.description: In order to help her smuggler kinsmen, a sultry gypsy seduces and corrupts an officer of the Civil Guard turning him into a traitor and murderer.

8.name: A Fool There Was
8.description: A married diplomat falls hopelessly under the spell of a predatory woman.

9.name: Civilization
9.description: Christ takes on the form of a pacifist count to end a senseless war.

10.name: Regeneration
10.description: A boy surrounded by violence grows up to become an infamous gangster.

11.name: Hypocrites
11.description: The parallel stories of a modern preacher and a medieval monk, Gabriel the Ascetic, who is killed by an ignorant mob for making a nude statue representing Truth, which is also represented by a ghostly naked girl who flits throughout the film.

12.name: Carmen
12.description: A Spanish soldier falls under the spell of a fiery gypsy girl named Carmen. His obsession with her leads to his ruin.

13.name: The Captive
13.description: With her brother killed Sonya is given Turkish captive Mahmud to do the hard work on the farm. After they become fond of each other he strikes a Turkish officer. When peace arrives, his ...                See full summary »

14.name: Maciste
14.description: A young girl, pursued by a band of conspirators, hides in a movie theatre where she watches the film Cabiria. She determines to seek the aid of that film's strongman, Maciste. When she ...                See full summary »

15.name: Madame Butterfly
15.description: The story of a Japanese woman and the tragedy that ensues when she loves an American naval officer.

16.name: The Italian
16.description: An immigrant leaves his sweetheart in Italy to find a better life across the sea in the grimy slums of New York. They are eventually reunited and marry. But life in New York is hard and ...                See full summary »

17.name: Fanchon, the Cricket
17.description: A young wild girl Fanchon ( Mary Pickford ) lives in a forest with her eccentric grandmother who is suspected by the villagers of being a witch. The unkempt Fanchon suffers from her ...                See full summary »

18.name: Assunta Spina
18.description: Napoli, gli inizi del secolo. Assunta Spina è una bella stiratrice ed ha per amante Michele, ma Raffaele continua a girarle attorno. Un giorno, durante il pranzo di onomastico a Marechiaro,...                See full summary »

20.name: The Diamond from the Sky
20.description: This serial told the story of the diamond heir loom of the Stanley family.

21.name: The Seven Sisters
21.description: Mici is the middle of seven sisters, who all believe if a younger sister marries first, the oldest sisters all doomed to be old maids. The elder sisters conspire to have the younger, pretty...                See full summary »

23.name: Martyrs of the Alamo
23.description: The story of the defense of the mission-turned-fortress by 185 Texans against an overwhelming Mexican army in 1836.

24.name: Life Without Soul
24.description: A young man gives life to a statue with disastrous results.

25.name: Far from the Madding Crowd
25.description: A girl farmer weds a faithless sergeant who is killed by her suitor, and realises she loves the bailiff.

26.name: Ultus, the Man from the Dead
26.description: Ultus, a man left for dead, returns to seek revenge on his scheming partner.

27.name: The Whirl of Life
27.description: The plot is a loose autobiographical interpretation of the life of Vernon and Irene Castle, interspersed among a typical melodrama of the period

29.name: The Eternal City
29.description: Leone, a Papal guard, is devastated when his wife drowns herself after mistakenly thinking that he had abandoned her. He turns over his son David to be brought up by nuns, then enters a ...                See full summary »

30.name: The Plunderer
30.description: Bill Matthews and his partner, owners of the "Croix D'or mine, are beset on all sides dues to the schemes of a trusted colleague who plots to take their mine away from them, and leaves no under-handed method un-attempted in the process.

31.name: Old Heidelberg
31.description: Karl Heinrich is the heir to the throne of the small European principality of Rutania, but he's a lonely child, not allowed to play with other children and knowing little about life outside...                See full summary »

32.name: The Silent Voice
32.description: Franklyn Starr, a talented and wealthy young musician, suffers a double misfortune in the sudden loss of his hearing and in the death of his Mother to whom he is deeply attached. He loses ...                See full summary »

33.name: Alias Jimmy Valentine
33.description: After robbing a bank, a criminal is wrongfully pardoned from prison.

36.name: Portret Doryana Greya
36.description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

37.name: The Goddess
37.description: A young girl is reared on a desert island by natives and led to believe that she is a goddess. One day an outsider comes to the island, and persuades her to accompany him to preach about ...                See full summary »

38.name: Inspiration
38.description: A young sculptor searches for the perfect model to inspire his work.

39.name: Voyna i mir
39.description: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of five aristocratic Russian families.

40.name: A tolonc
40.description: Betty (Lili Berky, Duel For Nothing), a young woman living in the country, is told by her dying father that he is really her uncle and raised her as his own when her mother was sent to ...                See full summary »

41.name: Filibus
41.description: Skypirate Filibus commits robberies from her airship, while a dedicated detective attempts to put a stop to it.

45.name: The Girl of the Golden West
45.description: Road agent Ramerrez hides out in his girlfriend's store where the Sheriff knows him to be. The Sheriff plays The Girl a game of cards to decide Ramerrez's future. She wins. She later saves him from a hanging. She rides off with him.

46.name: Ghosts
46.description: Helen and Manders are in love and wish to marry. Her parents object to his poverty and want her to marry Alving, a notorious rake, who is wealthy and powerful. Manders protests. The family ...                See full summary »

47.name: The Lamb
47.description: Gerald, the somewhat frail son of a wealthy New York family, is bested at the beach by Bill, a strapping young cowboy from Arizona. His fiancée Mary, ashamed of Gerald's "yellow streak", ...                See full summary »

48.name: Madame de Thèbes
48.description: King of the gypsies daughter Ayla give birth to a child with a man who does not belong to the tribe. She is cursed by his father and is expelled. A countess adopts the child.

49.name: The Coward
49.description: Confederate soldier Frank Winslow is terrified of the war and eventually runs away from battle. But when he finds himself behind enemy lines with vital information, he must decide between ...                See full summary »

50.name: Peer Gynt
50.description: A fantasy from Ibsen's verse drama. Ne'er-do-well and braggart Peer Gynt has many adventures in varied countries, making and losing money, gaining fortune at others' expense, until he finds...                See full summary »
